topics.body:
i just have to say one thing about the game right now
that i think is dumb
what kind of quarentine system turns off all the lights in a room and then only turns on a spinning amber light
and then when the monsters are dead, which i guess the ship just knows, because i guess they only have infectious diseases when alive, turns the lights back on

like i understand the game needs to be dark
but how about just, have there be power issues
not that the quarantine turns the lights off!

aphex twin: the stand has the capabilities of bending reality to his own will, it cant be controlled by anyone so nobody knows what is gonna come up next except complete havoc, any weak individual can easily fall to his control and be transformed by how the stand wants.

there, better?
topics.author: 5154c5237f123bcd580002fc

topics.body:
"@twistedmetalero":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/541261186368722722290000#post_541261186368722722290000

"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/541261c06368722ab5ee0000#post_541261c06368722ab5ee0000
Oh! Oh! I want to try!

Moonwalker: This stand grants the user the ability of perfect mobility, speed, flexibility, ETC.

And has an Ability that only works at night on a full moon where he can raise the dead, and use him as of though he was still alive.

So if the person dead was a Stand user, he can not only use the Dead man, but use the Dead mans stand.

As long as the user is not completely destroyed. 

But this ability only works at night on a full moon so The user must be _veeeery_ patient.

topics.body:
Apparently the Reps did not support a bill which limits money in politics... or does it?

Turns out the Bill actually allows Congress and the States to themselves regulate who can spend money and how much. Which is a problem as one can imagine. 

It was a very vaguely written bill and easy to abuse.
